# ✨ Sample of escaping

Show how to put codeblocks in the prompt _(which is already in the codeblock)_

-   PTBK URL https://ptbk.example.com/samples/escaping.ptbk.md@v1
-   PTBK VERSION 1.0.0

## 💬 Prompt

```
Rewrite the function

\`\`\`javascript
function greet() {
  return 'Hello';
}
\`\`\`

To return "Goodbye" instead.

```

`-> {greeting}`
